text: Art of War Undisputed Arena Fighting Championship: Art of War 1 was the inaugural mixed martial arts event by the mixed martial arts organization Art of War Undisputed Arena Fighting Championship. The event took place on Saturday, March 9, 2007 at the American Airlines Center in Dallas, Texas. The card aired on HDTV. == History == The fight card included Pedro Rizzo and Justin Eilers in the main event. The show also featured a bout between Carlo Prater and Anthony Lapsley. Hosted by Tommy Habeeb == Results== ==References== Category:2007 in mixed martial arts Category:Mixed martial arts events Category:Mixed martial arts in Texas
title: Art of War 1
